articles.author: Claudia Chiappa
articles.title: China to participate in Ukraine peace talks in Saudi Arabia - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Representative of the Chinese government will join over 40 countries in Jeddah for a meeting on a possible pathway to peace for Ukraine.
articles.content:
China will send a team to Saudi-hosted Ukraine peace talks, the Chinese foreign ministry said Friday.
Special Representative of the Chinese Government on Eurasian Affairs Li Hui will join leaders an… [+1597 chars]
